186028414.review:
Good solid ubisoft type game.   
Combat:   The good: Solid hand to hand combat, ranged combat is more sparse and used for insta-kill moves.  The bad:  "Bosses" come in one type with one moveset which are frankly easier than regular enemies.

Driving:  The good:  Even lacking a speedometer, driving feels very good and feels like you're going "fast".  Very enjoyable to drive and car battle mechanics are also unique and satisfying.   The bad:  It takes a good 2-3 seconds for Max to put a car in gear when he's stopped.  You will get stopped on occasion as typical "game car physics" happens when you hit an immovable object and your car spins around like a top.

Exploration: Probably the best part of the game, although the scrap rewards for clearing locations are pretty low.  Most of your scrap will come from defeating bigger enemy camps.  

*WARNING*   Ubisoft game servers for this are shut down so you will be unable to get one achievement and "offline scrap generation"

Otherwise solid 5/5 game.

186011147.review:
Im a huge fan of the Mad Max Mythology. MAD MAX ; FURY ROAD is my all time favorite movie. i know this game came out around that movie did, but at that time in my life i never got around to playing it. a decade later, i finally go to it, and im glad i did. This game has many of the positive qualities of the Batman Arkham series. From what i can tell, it uses many of the same foundational assets. and the progress system is largely identical, along with some light Base building, and resource gathering. 
The general structure of the game, andcombat is pretty much the same, as the Batman series, and that's a good thing. Positive qualities include, the sound, art, and characterization, respect for the lore, The sound is thunderous, and menacing. The visuals, follow Dr. Millers guiding rule of " just because the world is destroyed, that doesn't mean it cant be beautiful"  very well .

Since Max doesn't have any of Batman's rules, he can mutilate his enemies in ways that are visceral, and bloody, and flat out fun. This mayhem, and dismemberment extends to the vehicle combat , which is high octane, explosive, chaotic, and can span across several environments.. the game uses ideas from the Movies in fun ways, including the epic dust storms, grappling hooks, enemy camp surveillance, and raiding,  convoy combat, and even Max's signature Shotgun. 
   If your into the Lore, this game is well done, and seems to take place just before the events of Fury Road, and you get to explore locations, like Gas town, and the source of Bullet Farms explosives. 

overall this is a well done game, i enjoyed from beginning to end. if u like the Batman : Arkham games, this is alot like that but with a Mad Max vibe, and less emphasis on verticality , and stealth, and more on explosive vehicle combat. note: Arkham Knights "Tank/ Car" vehicle combat got old quick, whereas i found myself wanting more heavy, kinetic muscle car combat in the Wasteland

185993025.review:
Из очевидных плюсов - атмосферная игра, позволяющая рассекать по дорогам ярости на своём четырехколесном кастомизируемом "вестнике апокалипсиса". Педаль в пол и вперёд, воля сама подскажет через что пролегает дорога - насквозь через аванпост противника, или тараном через автомобиль очередного бандита, это уже не важно. В этом плане игра конечно хороша.

Захватываем + прокачиваем базы, уменьшаем насильственным путём количество бандитских конвоев, грейдим самого Макса (ну и машину, разумеется). Вся игра построена вокруг снижения влияния тех или иных бандитских группировок на довольно большой карте (фаст тревелы есть) и, само собой, гринде.

Честно - не смог пройти до конца (как минимум на момент написания обзора), если к вопросу с гриндом я лояльно отнесся в целом, то к моменту с зачисткой аванпостов я на каком-то этапе уже просто задушился. Ну, реально, их много, они конечно разнообразны и не повторяются, но сама суть их одна и та же. Подъедь к посту, снеси внешнюю оборону, подъедь к входу, выпрыгни из тачки, раскидай на кулаках все их живое содержимое. По началу боёвка выглядела в целом достаточно бодро и приятно, но с течением времени всё же надоедает. 

В такой игре хотелось бы соотношение 70 на 30, где 70 это ты как-либо взаимодействуешь с игровым миром через машину, а 30 решаешь вопросы пешочком. Здесь же соотношение что-то около 50 на 50 или даже 40 на 60, т.е. на своих двоих проводить времени приходится прилично.

Рекомендую ли я игру? Пусть и есть элементы духоты, тем не менее - да, рекомендую

185949356.review: Mad Max as a whole is a very entertaining open world game that doesn’t fall victim to the open world trappings of lesser open world games.  The story is engaging and entertaining.  The characters are interesting and fun.  The world feels lived in while also feeling completey empty.  The graphics hold up very well for a game that is... Now almost 10 years old.  I was initially reluctant to play this game because it was an open world game.  I find that open world games are rarely well planned out and instead filled with boring filler to pad out the experience and they require SO much of your time.  Mad Max isn’t like that.  The camps and bases that you capture, all seem unique and interesting, the bigger ones.  The smaller resource based installations are less unique, but nothing is cookie cutter copy pasta that you typically see in a lesser open world game.  This game is definitely worth your time and considering it’s age, it frequently comes up on sale but even without a sale, at $20.00 US, that is a hell of a bargain for one hell of a good time.

185884251.review:
Time for another Larrydilicious review. 

I 100% this game on my Xbox and got it on PC. I decided to write a review after I started my 100% on here. 

Firstly gameplay, you drive around a large map completing Far Cry-esque challenges, maybe even more similar to Red Faction. Completing these gives you scrap and levels, allowing you to unlock and buy new upgrades for max, your car, new weapons, and combat moves. You can participate in races and challenge runs. You can leave your car and explore and fight in enemy camps, scavenger locations, story areas, and more. There is plenty to do and it is plenty fun. 

The bad part about it, is similar to Far Cry, its about the same throughout the entire map, and the enemies differences are buy and large aesthetic and not mechanic. While the atmosphere of the game is very good and immerses you, when you see a glowing driveshaft in a box, it can sometimes pull you out of that. Its a little more arcadey than I'd like. While it is arcadey, seeing the 100% completion tickles something in my monkey brain. 

Secondly, graphics. For the time it came out they are excellent and still hold up. The atmosphere, as previously mentioned, is chef's kiss.  It really pulls you in and makes you feel like you're in the world of mad max, but also like mentioned previously, its more arcadey aspects pull you out of that occasionally. I love driving in the deadly sandstorms to get extra scrap to build up outposts so not only I can benefit but the people there. It feels like a very max thing to do. 

Thirdly, the story. You can play the entire game, and still enjoy it without touching the story. However, it is good, its not great, and its not groundbreaking, but at certain points its interesting for sure. The characters can be interesting, but they are not fleshed out and do not have a lot of character development. I'd say most of it is about Max's character development which makes sense. Even though he seems uncaring and is, he finds a soft spot inside him at many points, which is why the ending can be weird. 

Fourthly, the price. It's $20. Not bad, you'll get your time out of it if you enjoy an assassin's creed, far cry, red faction -esque game. The combat is fulfilling, and fun, it can be a little too easy at times, especially when you figure out its extremely, way too simple, mechanics. I'd pick it up on sale if Warner ever does that, but I've never seen it. 

I could go on and on about each topic, but I won't. Hopefully that is sufficient enough for you to get it or not. Thank you for your time and as always if you disagree or just want to say hi, comment below.

Mad Max est un jeu d'action/aventure dont l'ambiance donnée par la direction artistique est très immersive et prenante. C'est un jeu de caractère, original et dont les quêtes et sites sont beaucoup plus variés et différents (fait à la main) que pourraient laisser penser les critiques de l'époque.
En 2025 je trouve ça encore très beau et c'est parfaitement optimisé.
Malheureusement, joueur de clavier/souris, pas doué mais opiniâtre, je n'ai pas réussi à finir le jeu car je ne parviens pas à réussir les quêtes finales de courses automobiles. Après 20 tentatives pour maîtriser ma voiture transformée en savonnette, j'ai dû laisser tomber. Je suis déçu de devoir regarder la fin sur youtube, mais comme d'autres pourront certainement et facilement passer cet écueil, je recommande tout de même le titre pour son atmosphère incroyable et si justement fidèle à l'oeuvre originale.

My only complaint is that some cars feel a bit floaty, but I have that problem only with the stolen ones; the Magnum Opus is delightful to drive. Combat is simple, just right and left click, but it makes you feel strong AF. Bullets are understandably rare to find, but once you level up and set up in strongholds, you got nothing to worry about. 
Sometimes it feels unfair that I spend minutes chasing a car down just because I accidentally swerved, but they can easily catch up even with me using the boost, but I'll see if this issue persists after I upgrade my car fully (getting the 10K scraps achievement). 
I didn't feel the need to use fast travel, because honestly the best part is driving the car and finding things along the way. Leveling up is pretty quick because there is always something to do. 17 hours on record so far, and I didn't even fully clean 4 areas yet. Definitely worth it; it's an amazing adaptation of the movie.

185781250.review:
Everybody says this game is underrated. While I can see the potential for the game to have been better at the time it was released, there are several issues that hold it back.

Firstly, the hand to hand combat is satisfying at first but doesn't really evolve and eventually becomes frustrating due to poor camera angles and unavoidable, unparryable attacks in certain situations.

Secondly, the story is weak. The main character is not interesting at all. [Spoiler] Chumbucket was my favourite character, and he was killed off for absolutely no reason. The dog had so much potential the game acts as though it plays a role, but it doesn’t. He’s only available in one specific type of car used for mine detection and their disabling. [/Spoiler]

Thirdly, the game is extremely repetitive. I wanted to achieve 100% completion, but after clearing one area, I simply gave up. It wasn’t a fun or enjoyable experience. I attempted a few side quests, but they were uninteresting. With the servers disabled, scrap collection becomes tedious and unnecessarily time-consuming. I didn’t even fully upgrade my car before finishing the game.

That said, there are some positive aspects of the game. The setting is well-designed, and the environment looks beautiful for its time.

There was so much potential in this game that was not expanded upon.

185755167.review:
Un viaje emocionante en un mundo post-apocalíptico

Mad Max es un juego que, sin lugar a dudas, ofrece una experiencia de entretenimiento única. En este título, el jugador se sumerge en un vasto y peligroso mundo abierto, donde la acción y la exploración son protagonistas. El juego presenta una gran cantidad de misiones que mantienen el interés del jugador, tanto principales como secundarias, todas ellas bien diseñadas y cargadas de adrenalina.

Los gráficos son impresionantes, con paisajes áridos y desolados que reflejan perfectamente la atmósfera post-apocalíptica que caracteriza el universo de Mad Max. La atención al detalle es notable, desde los vehículos personalizables hasta los escenarios llenos de detalles que hacen del mundo abierto un lugar lleno de vida y misterio.

Otro de los grandes atractivos del juego es la sensación de libertad que ofrece. El mundo es vasto y te invita a explorarlo sin restricciones, mientras enfrentas batallas épicas, interactúas con diversos personajes y te enfrentas a desafíos cada vez más intensos.

En resumen, Mad Max es un título altamente recomendable para quienes disfrutan de los juegos de acción en mundos abiertos. Su jugabilidad envolvente, sus impresionantes gráficos y la gran cantidad de misiones aseguran horas de diversión sin parar.

185691820.review:
You can thank George Miller for not having a second game. He hated the game so much that he was going to begin litigation against Warner Bros/Avalanche studios because they used all the material, which he gave them, allegedly spoiling the next 3 Mad Max movies. The game spoiled a protagonist that died in the new Furiosa movie for example. You can see the conclusion of Furiosa in a tomb depicted on the walls. Chumbucket only appeared recently in Furiosa, yet we gamers know about him since 2015!

All the car designs and some characters are from the unmade Mel Gibson's Mad Max 4, which was being filmed in Tunisia before 9/11. When 9/11 happened they ended the production and sent all the vehicles back to Australia, where they remained in storage until the Fury Road movie began production.
He said Metal Gear creator Hideo Kojima could do better, as he wanted a set path Mad Max game, more story focused.

Another nougat of info not many people notice at first, all the characters part of the story have American accents, except for Crow Dazzle and random encounters. Max was originally voiced with an American accent, which caused controversy, so they changed it last minute.

Personally, this game, this Mad Max, is the Max we should have gotten in the sequels, instead we got basically got no Max in two movies, which I think are terrible Mad max movies. Fury road only worked visually because they had lots of cars to destroy practically, they didn't even bother build more to destroy for Furiosa.

And whats up with the narrative shift from no oil and nuclear wars in the first 3 movies, to LOADS of oil, but little water, something in the water killed everyone, then the water disappeared, its mentioned in the games historic relics, the planet is getting revenge on humanity, and all the planes fell out of the skies all at the same time suggesting global E.M.P attacks? There are lots of clouds in the game, no rain, and a massive moon. Did the closer moon lift the oceans into the sky?

185677146.review:
Неплохая игра своего времени

Практически прошел до конца и наиграл 41 час. Играть интересно первые 10 часов далее идет долгий и муторный гринд (к которому по сути никто не принуждает). Практически весь контент в игре состоит из популярных на то время аванпостов (хотя и сейчас используются нередко), и вышек в той или иной их итерации (пугала, снайперы и т.д. и т.п.). Проблема подобной структуры игры, которая держится на аванпостах, заключается в том, что достаточно трудно сделать их интересными для прохождения (т.е. закрывать их муторно и неинтересно). С этой задаче игра и не справляется. Зачистив ВСЕ аванпосты, я нашел лишь один связанный непосредственно с фишкой игры - МАШИНОЙ. Остальные зачищаются путем штурма на своих двоих и жестким задалбливанием кнопки удара (отрицать не буду, персонаж эффектно разбрасывает всех в стороны, но невозможно отрицать того, что боевка однокнопочная)   . 
Сюжет второстепенен и во многом игра вывозит лишь геймплейно (отдача от управления машиной и обилки даже сейчас выглядят достойно).
7-ка по 10-бальной шкале по одной простой причине - игру спасает портатив. На Steam Deck игра хороша (полежать на диване и во время просмотра кино кататься по миру Безумного Макса достаточно интересно для того чтобы не надоедать своими проблемами в стационаре).

185578858.review:
Mad Max é um jogo que entrega exatamente o que promete: uma experiência imersiva no universo pós-apocalíptico inspirado nos filmes. Com +-29 horas de gameplay, posso destacar os seguintes pontos:

Pontos Positivos

1. Ambientação e Visual
O mundo aberto é um espetáculo visual. Os desertos desolados, tempestades de areia e ruínas de uma civilização perdida criam uma atmosfera única que captura perfeitamente o espírito do universo Mad Max.


2. Sistema de Combate

Combate Corpo a Corpo: A mecânica de luta é inspirada no estilo "Arkham", mas com uma brutalidade única que combina com o personagem. É simples, mas satisfatória.

Combate Veicular: A verdadeira estrela do jogo. Melhorar o Magnum Opus e usá-lo em combates explosivos contra os War Boys é viciante.



3. Personalização
A customização do Magnum Opus é um dos elementos mais envolventes. Desde a escolha de armamentos até ajustes na suspensão, tudo impacta diretamente na jogabilidade.


4. Progressão
O jogo oferece diversas atividades, como limpar fortalezas, destruir espantalhos e explorar cavernas, mantendo o jogador constantemente ocupado.


5. Narrativa
Apesar de simples, a história tem momentos emocionantes e cumpre bem o papel de conectar as missões com o universo Mad Max.




---

Pontos Negativos

1. Repetitividade
Após as primeiras 10-15 horas, as atividades secundárias começam a parecer repetitivas. A coleta de sucata, por exemplo, torna-se um ciclo previsível.


2. Falta de Variedade nos Inimigos
Os inimigos, apesar de bem projetados, carecem de variedade, o que impacta na sensação de desafio ao longo do jogo.


3. História Linear
Embora imersiva, a narrativa principal poderia ter mais ramificações ou escolhas que afetassem o desfecho.


4. Mundo Abandonado
Embora isso seja fiel à temática pós-apocalíptica, algumas áreas do mapa poderiam ter mais eventos dinâmicos ou elementos interativos.




---

Conclusão

Mad Max oferece uma experiência sólida, especialmente para fãs da franquia e do gênero de mundo aberto. Apesar de seus pontos fracos, é um jogo que recompensa o jogador com combates intensos, visuais incríveis e uma sensação de progressão consistente.

Nota pessoal: 8/10
Recomendo, especialmente se estiver em promoção ou se você gosta de jogos focados em exploração e combate.

Бо́льшая часть активностей это зачистка однотипных точек интереса на карте коих ОЧЕНЬ МНОГО. Даже для меня заядлого любителя зачищать лагеря фармить это все стало душниной. В игре хватает странных ненужных механик вроде фляги и бензина (зачем?).  И в целом создаётся ощущение будто разработчики сами не понимали, что они хотят сделать. Ради достижений закрывал все эти точки интереса, но в конце ощущаю лишь болезненное чувство потраченного времени.

185520730.review:
Abgewrackte Karren und Ödland

Hier geht’s zu meinem Waetsch's Play:
https://youtu.be/aVlpbXVEvJc

Direkt zu Anfang wird uns gleich die Karre geklaut und wir werden in der Wüste zurückgelassen. So was kann uns natürlich nicht stoppen und wir raffen uns auf, besorgen uns ein neues Auto und sinnen auf Vergeltung. Dies alles machen wir im tristen Ödland. Im Rahmen der Möglichkeiten ist das auch tatsächlich schön in Szene gesetzt. Überall gibt es noch verrostete Relikte der Zivilisation und ausgeschlachtete Schrottkarren. Dennoch fährt man hier die meiste Zeit durchs Ödland. Viel grafische Abwechslung sollte man also nicht erwarten - aber hey, es ist eben Mad Max. Das Spiel selbst fühlt sich ein ganz kleines bisschen nach Ubisoft an, wir laufen zu einem Aussichtspunkt und die Karte ist vollgepflastert mit Aufgaben. Also zerstören wir Leuchtfeuer, erobern feindliche Stützpunkte usw. Das alles spielt sich sehr fluffig, allerdings wiederholen sich viele Aufgaben immer und immer wieder. Die Kämpfe ohne Waffe sind dynamisch wie in den Batman-Arkham-Spielen. Die meiste Zeit sind wir allerdings in unserem Auto unterwegs und rammen unsere Gegner weg. Eine Schrotflinte steckt natürlich auch im Halfter. Neben dem aufskillen von Max können wir auch unser Auto verbessern und auch andere Fahrzeuge "erobern". Ein Spiel, das nicht alles perfekt, aber vieles richtig macht und vor allem die Stimmung der Mad Max-Filme hervorragend einfängt.

Folgt mir auch gerne bei Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/curator/41912197-waetschs-play

185516983.review: I may only have 10 hours on this game but I can stay without a doubt that is is the only game that has done it right. Rage 2 could have had it but they were really interested in only driving. There was no form of plan or execution. Don't get me wrong just driving around and shooting stuff can be fun but at least make it look good. Mad Max gets the best of everything. Combat looks flashy and gruesome while not being complicated. The driving looks good for it's age and it really does feel like you are driving in a wasteland. When you see the dirt kicking up in the distance and hear engines getting louder it makes you either want to run away which is all kinds of fun trying to see how you can out maneuver and get the upper hand OR try to absolutely dismantle whatever was causing it. I know Mad max came out in 2015 but it aged like wine and plays like butter. The controls are a little weird but nothing you can't change in the keybinds. This is a game I think everybody should try at some point even if you don't think you would like it. I will say if you want to fully get rid of the depth of field stuff you will need reshade and if you go onto nexus mods you can grab a shader if you don't like the older look.

185507745.review:
Макса в очередной раз лишили всего и он отправляется МСТИТЬ. Попутно помогая всем встречным и свергая тиранию местного злодея. Сюжет не претендует ни на какие награды, но свою роль мостика между миссиями он выполняет. И, более того, некоторые моменты получились очень даже интересными, вроде гонки с прихвостнем злодея и путешествие по аэропорту. Сюжетных выборов как таковых тут только один и тот связан с тем, какой первый кузов будет на вашем авто.

Макс адекватно говорит и поступает, в меру циничен и немногословен. Но опасные маньяки зачастую кажутся самыми спокойными — и на деле Макс тут чуть ли не самый помешанный из всех. Он исступленно предан своей машине и слепо стремится в Безмолвную Равнину, которая вполне может оказаться вымышленной. Как и в фильмах, безумие Макса не бьет фонтаном, а тихо горит внутри и пожирает сознание. Оно проходит фоном по всей игре и лишь изредка дает о себе знать.
И, на удивление, в конце концов игра погружается в сознание Макса куда глубже, чем это делали фильмы. Но говорить об этом больше значит испортить все удовольствие. В Mad Max очень Максовская история с очень Максовским финалом.

Стычки на колесах — лучшее, что есть в Mad Max. По пустоши колесят вражеские патрули, по автострадам курсируют конвои, и любая встреча с ними может плавно и совершенно случайно перетечь в долгую, яростную погоню. Особенно эффектно 
выглядят песчаные бури в которых погони выглядят ещё эпичнее. 

Mad Max совершенно точно нельзя назвать на 100% хорошей игрой. Тут много однообразных побочных миссий, но гонки здесь великолепные. Сюжет весьма обычный, но многие из заданий весьма неплохи даже среди тех, что проходятся пешком. Если быть совсем уж кратким, то игру стоит покупать только ради автомобильной части: погонь, гонок и медленной езды по атмосферным пейзажам по пути к следующему месту наживы.

185449578.review:
Shame this game didn't do better. It's a flawed game that's derivative in more than one way (the repetitive combat for example is the one button plus counter most people will remember from other WB games) but what it does right it does right it really nails, and those are the most important things for this game to get right, imo. The driving, the environment and atmosphere, the sense of scale, the characters and voice acting all really come together to make a game that's better than the sum of its parts. In context, even the spare brutality and efficiency of the combat seems to make sense.

I would have liked to see slightly less linear character progression - once you unlock better gear there's no gameplay reason not to use it. Not insignificantly this is better handles with the car modification, where there are trade offs to using certain equipment and while some of the preset "archangels" may be objectively better than others, there's a lot more room to try different builds. I would have loved to have seen it all expanded on in a hypothetical sequel though

It's not a a perfect game by any means but it might be the best Mad Max game we'll ever get and it's worth your time on its own merits if you enjoy similar games. It also goes on deep sales.

185443176.review:
UPDATE: after 30 more hours

Wow, how did nobody told me about this game? it perfectly captures the Fury Road aestetic and mad max post-apocaliptic vibes. IT IS 1.99 ON SALES!!!

THERE IS A FIRST PERSON MODE IN VEICHLES! also this is the first game I'm obsessed by the photo mode, costantly posing my character for roleplay photos and try to get the perfect frame during aerial stunts.

the combat stil is carried from Batman so you know it's satisfying, you grow up along your car as you upgrade it and it feels there is A LOT to do in the world, I'm still trying to 100% the second area before moving up with the story missions. everything you do progress you to some unlocks so it doesn't feel like a chore. even getting sidetracked and following a convoy will automatically tags a bunch of POIs around the convoy's course so that if you fail to destroy it you'll still have plenty to do as a consolation prize. 

there are lots of lines even for secondary enemies, and you never get tired of you companion Chum, sometimes even poking fun at you if you keep entering the car on the wrong side.

only downside is that I wish they pumped more into the sound design, maybe it's my headphone's fault but I don't feel that THUMP of different engines and exhausts like racing simulators where you could tell a diesel from a benz engine just by hear.
also if you want to 100% the game you will need an external savegame that was made before they shut off internet services, but the upside of this is that all DLC are free if you know where to look for and Steam can't verify them it just unlocks them for you.


Overall: best game from a movie I've ever played, the devs had access to Miller's concept art and scripts to make this a soft-canon adaptation of the Fury Road saga

185405529.review:
On its own its a fine game, but oh my *GOD* the pc version is such a piece of crap its begs me to wonder if the devs has played literally any other videogame on a computer before making this one. lets go down the list:

- the settings menu on the home screen is broken. it shows only 3 of the 20+ settings, and will un-fullscreen your game if you try to use it. dont even bother.
- the game will, by default, mute all cutscene volume, lower all graphics settings to minimum, and turn OFF mouse sensitivity. because of the aforementioned settings menu issue you cant do anything about this AFTER you have sat thru the intro cutscene that will look like ass and be completely silent.
- the controls are absolutely, without competition, the most bone headed controls I have ever seen in a video game. ctrl is jump. space is boost while shift is handbrake. Exit vehicle is R, Repair vehicle is E (come on!).
- not helping the controls is that NO CONTROL ACTION IS CONTEXTUAL. what do I mean by this? I mean that you cannot double bind anything that is used in different contexts, for example: want to >>Enter<< (WITH AN E) the vehicle using the same button you use to interact with everything else (E)? go fuck yourself. 
- there are various moments where the game will and wont tell you that you must complete one of these unintuitively assigned actions to progress, if you cannot figure out what it wants you to do and what button you need to press to continue max will just stand there like an idiot and you wont be able to move. 
- the tutorial is an actual hour long of fetch quests where you go grab something and return to your garage. I timed it, an actual HOUR before you get to just play the normal game (99 mins for me, because of the time spent replaying the intro and fixing as much of the settings as I could). dont worry tho, the tutorials dont stop there. you are frequently forced through this games shitty menu system to stumble your way through its vague language and- again- terrible controls to progress.

after spending your first 20 minutes fixing most of these issues yourself, and occasionally just having to get over it since the game gives you no way at all to do anything about them, the game itself is great which is the worst part. its a fantastic and fun game marred by terrible, unintuitive, and- in aspects- un-fixable controls, weird technical issues, and odd stutters (32gb ram, nvme ssd, 5800x3d, rtx 3090). it supports ultrawide at least, so theres that. one singular shining accomplishment on a pile of otherwise truly bone headed technical decisions and errors.

Открытый мир пустой и картонный, случайные события сводятся к стычкам с одинаковыми патрулями, что быстро наскучивает, а потом и начинает раздражать. Лут и крафт для галочки, прокачка неадекватна. Лут вообще заключается только в ломе(местная валюта), патронах и коллекционках. Управление машинами чуть лучше чем в Марио Карт. Да и багов хватает. Сюжет просто плох, концовка явно подогнана так, чтобы не конфликтовать с каноном. Что делает её нелогичной, ведь [spoiler]Макс теряет всё, чего добивался всю игру тупо, чтобы отомстить своему врагу[/spoiler]. P.S. Статистика достижений о многом говорит. На данный момент сюжет прошли всего 28% игроков, лишь 11% прокачали машину до конца, а все достижения выбили всего 2,2% игроков.

Primeira Impressão: Quando comecei a jogar Mad Max, notei que o personagem parecia um pouco "pesado" na movimentação. No entanto, essa sensação se dissipou à medida que fui me acostumando ao controle do personagem.

Gráficos: Para um jogo lançado em 2015, Mad Max continua impressionando com seus gráficos em 2025. A qualidade visual é excelente e contribui significativamente para a imersão no mundo pós-apocalíptico.

Jogabilidade e Controles: Os comandos do jogo são simples e intuitivos. No entanto, a jogabilidade do carro pode exigir algumas horas de adaptação para um controle mais preciso.

Enredo: A história do jogo é intermediária. Embora não seja extremamente envolvente, consegue manter o jogador interessado o suficiente para continuar explorando e completando missões.

Momentos Memoráveis: Os momentos mais memoráveis incluem a destruição dos carros e as batalhas intensas, além da possibilidade de customizar o veículo e o personagem. Essas características adicionam uma camada extra de diversão ao jogo.

Desempenho Técnico: Felizmente, não encontrei nenhum bug que comprometesse a jogabilidade. Isso é um ponto positivo, pois garante uma experiência de jogo mais fluida e sem interrupções.

Trilha Sonora e Efeitos Sonoros: A trilha sonora recebe uma nota 6, enquanto os efeitos sonoros merecem uma nota 7. Embora não sejam extraordinários, cumprem bem o seu papel dentro do contexto do jogo.

Custo-Benefício: Para quem está pensando em adquirir o jogo, minha recomendação é aguardar promoções. Isso tornará a compra ainda mais satisfatória e com melhor relação custo-benefício.

185301280.review:
Je pensais jouer à un jeu lambda, sans sensation. Résultat : je me suis pris une ptite claque.
Un jeu créé par des passionnés, pour des joueurs passionnés de l’univers. Alors un grand Merci (car c’est plus rare aujourd’hui sur des gros jeux).

Dès les premières secondes : le ton est donné. Ici, on joue Max. Mad Max. Clairement. Ca annonce du sa(b)le, du bourrin, de la brutasse, de la Fureur.

Le jeu date de 2015. Donc oui : 10 ans plus tard, ça peut se ressentir sur quelques aspects. Et pourtant, le jeu n'a rien à envier des sorties actuelles.

Ce jeu n'est pas un gunfight. Il est fait pour conduire, taper, et tout péter. Le gameplay prend les tripes dès le départ, que ce soit à bord de notre véhicule (et cette vue interne incroyable...), ou que ce soit à pieds. La tension est là. T'es dans le désert, et on n'est pas là pour des câlins. Gameplay bourrin, brute, tu sens que ça casse. Oui : Max est un peu lourd en terme de gestuelle. Mais on s'habitue vite, et quel bonheur lorsqu'il enchaîne les coups, lorsqu'il casse, lorsqu'il massacre. Quel bonheur de faire vrombrir le moteur de notre caisse à travers le désert, le faire résonner entre les canyons (car oui, les détails immersifs sont là, jusqu'aux grains de sables qui viennent frotter la carcasse de votre véhicule), de vivre des courses poursuites aussi intenses (vue interne <3) avec de la ferraille et de la poussière qui vole dans tous les sens.

Les tempêtes de sable : réussite totale visuellement, sonore, tout.

Le jeu est complet, l'histoire est typique d'un Mad max = ça va pas chercher loin, et ça reste pour autant très efficace. On est ici pour que ça déménage. Pour avoir du sombre, de la haine, de l'injustice. J'ai été surpris positivement par la tournure scénaristique du jeu, qui pourrait totalement faire office d'un film, finalement.

Oui, la trame et la mise en scène de l'Histoire Principale est équivalente à un excellent film, dont on est acteur. Avec les courses poursuites qu'on aime et toute la poussière que ça engendre. Les cris des Warboys qui grimpent sur les véhicules. Les commentaires de Max et de son mécano. Certains événements filmés d'une caméra immersive afin de transmettre au joueur ce que peut éprouver Max.

Le combat final est épique. Il vient faire honneur à un Fury Road, en y mêlant un air de scénario dramatique. La dernière minute vient nous lier directement à Max.

Bref, vous l'aurez compris. Que ce soit en terme de gameplay (brute, fureur), du son (immersion totale, ces ambiances dans les camps, musiques dignes des récents films), scénaristique (un scénario qui gagne en profondeur et qui surprend sur la dernière partie), de la mise en scène (les caméras bien placées, les musiques qui s'arrêtent quand il faut, etc.) : le jeu est réussi.

Vous aimez Mad Max ? Vous avez également aimé l'ambiance Fury Road et Furiosa ? Vous voulez prolonger votre plaisir ? Je ne sais pas pourquoi vous lisez encore cet avis : vous devriez déjà être entrain d'y jouer.

Et souvenez-vous : n'énervez pas Max. Oh non. Ne le mettez pas en colère.

185289214.review:
Overall it is a pretty good game. The plot itself isn't anything special. In fact it's refreshingly simple and in line with the typical mad max story line. Max is waylaid by bandits, Max doesn't want to help the downtrodden, Max decides to help them anyways and gets burned, Max then goes on a revenge tour. Nothing too complicated, however, it does answer the question of what happened to that other son of immortan joe that's seen in Furisoa but not Fury Road.

Gameplay wise it is clear that the game is padding for time, it is the same game copied and stapled together four times, we didn't need four different warlords, one or two would have done the trick, and the vast open world quickly runs out of luster after it dawns on you that there is no reason for you to explore it beyond doing the main quests. However, this game thrives in combat, specifically with cars. That is the main mechanic of the game, and to its credit it does it very well.

If the game was just a short 10 hour affair I think that would warrant a 8 or 9 out of 10, but due to the fact the game keeps dragging on brings this down to a 6 or a 7. Still a good game, just could've used some pacing work and or more exciting side quests.

185214639.review:
Like all open world games, this one boils down to a rotating checklist of gameplay loops linked by an overworld. 

Unlike other open worlds, this one is the wasteland - and omfg what a gorgeous wasteland it is. 

This thing runs perfectly on maxed out settings on my steam deck OLED and it is one of the most immersive visual experiences I've had with 2d screens. Gaspworthy, jawdropping visuals and effects that nail the mad max style to the wall make this game seem like it's the original IP and all the movies the spinoffs. 

All the little gameplay loop bits are fun to do too, for the most part. The driving combat is fast, crunchy, and brutal  - and so is the melee brawling for that matter. It's all very mad max and very easy to get lost in. Unfortunately - there is just way too much overworld, and not enough variety in all the little gameplay loop bits. 

Even though the infinite open-world that is actually a rotating checklist formula is more or less completely played out at this point, this is probably one of the single greatest examples of it simply by virtue of how perfectly the film concept matches the structure of the game itself.

185181858.review:
Mad Max – Ein post-apokalyptisches Abenteuer mit Schwächen

Wirst du der Krieger des Ödlands oder das Opfer seiner Brutalität?

In einer Welt, die dem Untergang geweiht ist, bist du Mad Max, ein einsamer Krieger, der nur noch eines im Sinn hat: überleben. Mad Max entführt dich in ein düsteres, post-apokalyptisches Ödland, in dem es nur zwei Dinge gibt, die zählen: dein Kriegsfahrzeug und dein Überlebensinstinkt. Anfänglich wirkt das Spiel wie eine spannende Reise durch diese zerstörte Welt – mit einem Hauptaugenmerk auf Kämpfe und das Sammeln von Ressourcen, um dein Auto zu einem unaufhaltsamen Kriegsmaschinen-Ungetüm zu verwandeln.

Die ersten Stunden: Packende Atmosphäre und spannende Kämpfe

Zu Beginn ist Mad Max ein echtes Abenteuer. Das Spiel baut eine beeindruckende, düstere Atmosphäre auf. Die weiten, staubigen Ebenen, das ständige Rauschen der Motoren und das zermürbende Warten auf die nächste Überlebensprobe ziehen dich sofort in den Bann. Der Hauptfokus des Spiels liegt auf dem Überlebenskampf – und zwar auf zwei Ebenen. Zum einen zu Fuß, wenn du in hitzigen Nahkämpfen gegen feindliche Horden kämpfst, und zum anderen in deinem Fahrzeug, das du während des Spiels aufmotzen kannst, um Gegner in waghalsigen Rennen und brutalen Fahrzeugkämpfen zu bezwingen.

Die ersten Stunden des Spiels sind von einem ziemlich hohen Spannungslevel geprägt. Du beginnst damit, zu kämpfen, zu plündern und dein Auto zu verbessern. Jede Fahrt durch das Ödland ist ein neues Abenteuer, und das Aufleveln deines Wagens fühlt sich unglaublich befriedigend an. Dabei entsteht der Eindruck eines Spiels, das den Spieler belohnt – und das macht zunächst richtig Spaß.

Doch dann: Wiederholung, Langeweile und Frust

Leider hält der Spaß nicht lange an. Die meisten Missionen und Aktivitäten beginnen sich nach einer Weile stark zu wiederholen. Das Sammeln von Schrott, das Aufleveln von Ausrüstung und Fahrzeugen wird zunehmend zur monotonen Pflicht. Immer wieder musst du dieselben Gebiete erkunden, dieselben Gegner besiegen und das gleiche plündern, was irgendwann den Reiz verliert. Was zu Beginn noch nach einer spannenden Herausforderung klingt, wird zu einer lästigen Routine.

Die Story, die anfangs vielversprechend begann, verliert schnell an Tiefe und wird sehr flach. Max ist der typische einsame Held, der in einer chaotischen Welt nach Frieden strebt, doch die erzählerischen Elemente des Spiels reichen nicht aus, um das Interesse langfristig zu halten. Die Dialoge sind nicht besonders tiefgründig, und die Charaktere bleiben blass. Es fehlt die emotionale Tiefe, die einem Spiel wie diesem eigentlich Leben einhauchen könnte.

Das Autorennen – Der Tiefpunkt

Ein Moment, der für viele Spieler der endgültige Wendepunkt war, ist das Autorennen, das im späteren Spielverlauf auftaucht. Für viele war dies ein Albtraum, der die eigentlich gute Atmosphäre des Spiels zerstört hat. Die Steuerung des Fahrzeugs in den Rennen fühlt sich schwerfällig und frustrierend an, was in einem Spiel, das auf Fahrzeugkämpfe setzt, ein riesiges Problem darstellt. Die Schwierigkeit der Rennen ist oft unangemessen, und die Strafe für Fehler fühlt sich unnötig hoch an, was das Spiel noch langweiliger macht. Das Rennen wird zu einer unnötigen Hürde, die viele Spieler aus dem Spiel herauswirft und ihnen die Lust nimmt, weiterzumachen.

Fazit: Viel Potenzial, aber auch viele Schwächen

Mad Max ist ein Spiel mit viel Potenzial, das in den ersten Stunden sehr fesselnd und spannend wirkt. Die Atmosphäre, die Kämpfe und das Aufmotzen des Fahrzeugs sorgen für ein gutes Spielgefühl. Doch leider hat das Spiel mit den typischen Problemen vieler Open-World-Spiele zu kämpfen: zu viel Wiederholung und eine fehlende Tiefgründigkeit in der Story. Die Monotonie des Sammelns, die Frustration bei den Rennen und die fehlende emotionale Tiefe lassen das Spiel irgendwann langweilig und repetitiv wirken.

Wer auf der Suche nach einer Action-orientierten Erfahrung in einer post-apokalyptischen Welt ist, könnte an Mad Max zunächst seine Freude haben. Doch nach einer Weile wird das Spiel zur lästigen Pflicht, die irgendwann nur noch mit "Farming" und "Warten auf das Ende" verbunden wird.

Für den geringen Preis mag es noch erträglich sein, doch bei Vollpreis würde ich mich nach dem endgültigen Rückschlag mit dem Autorennen und der immer wiederkehrenden Aufgabenstruktur sicherlich ärgern.

185180043.review:
Truly an underrated game. If you like that nice and sweet balance of Warner Bros type of beat-em-up and semi-open world story telling, (like Shadow of Mordor/War and the Batman Arkham Aslume games.) then you'll deeply appreciate this game. 

Not to mention the surprisingly GREAT world building/story and the gritty, utility-based/hit-and-run car game-play. 
The graphics hold up well due to the good design of the games' art-style and it's heavy use of post-processing to give it that MAD MAX look you love to see.

In retrospect, this game does it's job as an adaptation of the movies SUPER WELL. Not in story alone, but in feeling. 
When you punch, kill, driver, get injured, grab scrap and gear; you feel each and every single impact and movements from the animations of Max alone. The oil that gets split on your screen after you blow up a car, it's flaming embers falling in-front of the heat haze of the scorching hot sun.

The industrial music that kicks in when you ram a gate open, vying to capture a half-destroyed bullet farm. Heaving through the unnatural chanting and war cries of the people trying to kill you. The upgrading of max and seeing how he transforms to be more viscous and violent whilst trying to make peace with himself while also trying to figure out how to make the strongest car in the middle of a war-torn dry ocean-bed, with it abundance of bandits, tribes, looters, psychos, warlords and soldiers. The voice acting is superb and the way the cars sound is beautiful.

The whole game is extremely satisfying and really a testament to the games' conceptual designs. 8/10. Why 8 and not 10? because this game doesn't really have a lot of replayability to it once you finish the game and it does have SOME bugs that are annoying, but nothing game breaking. It can also get a bit tedious, though that's more a play-style issue.

Still, i implore you to play it. Trust me. Buy it.

Логики просто не существует в этой игре, особенно захват (уничтожение) лагерей с бензином/добычей нефти.
Столкновения на машинах аркадные, сомнительные, и ты стараешься их избегать. Радовали только конвои. Красивые кинематографичные погони с использованием разного арсенала. Кастомизация неплохая, что авто, что Максима.
Сюжет понравился, сюжет доп заданий понравился.
Драки понравились куда больше столкновений на машинах.
С некоторым возмущением и негодованием я прошел эту игру, но она мне понравилась. Хотя могло быть и лучше

185161574.review:
There's a good game in there somewhere. But with every good aspect comes a huge bag of buts. 
 
The only thing that is great without compromise is the visuals. Great car designs, weather effects, the environment.  That and the fighting system is what kept me playing.

 Now the not so great parts.
 Car handling and physics are surprisingly unsatisfying. It's a strange middle ground between some realism and then strange arcade stuff with side-ramming and ramming in general. Plus the strange "backwards" progression, where the further you get into the game the weaker your car gets compared to enemies made the car battles unsatisfying and halfway through I just fast traveled and avoided the random roaming car encounters whenever possible. 

The writing. While for the most part the story is meh but doesn't get in the way. Until it completely craps itself in the end. Couple that with breaking of the the established gameplay for the sake of "story" where you can be winning flawlessly but then defeated by a cutscene or scripted event.  Just left me wondering wtf happened there. I would be relly pissed off if I didn't get it with a huge discount.

 In the end. It's a decent game hampered by strange design decisions, controller oriented control scheme and strange writing. So much wasted potential.

185156116.review:
⚠️ Attention : critique instantanée d'un jeu par moi ⚠️

🎮 Nom du jeu : Mad Max

📖 Histoire : Vous êtes Max, le célèbre protagoniste des films du même nom. Vous tentez de fuir une attaque des hommes de Scrotus. Malheureusement, vous vous faites capturer. Suite à un combat acharné contre Scrotus lui-même, vous en sortez semi-vainqueur. Scrotus est mortellement blessé et vous êtes gravement blessé. Vous n'avez plus rien, à part la compagnie de l'ancien chien de Scrotus. Plus loin, vous rencontrerez Chumbucket, un mécanicien aux doigts noirs. Il créera pour vous la Magnum Opus, le meilleur véhicule de tous les temps, que lui a confié l'ange de la combustion. Améliorez votre voiture autant que possible pour finalement sortir de cet enfer et vous venger des hommes de Scrotus au passage.

💡 Infos sur le jeu : Le jeu est basé sur les véhicules, donc c'est la principale chose sur laquelle vous devrez vous concentrer. L'histoire est une version alternative du film Mad Max: Fury Road. Vous rencontrerez seulement Scrotus et non son personnage, Immortan Joe, ni les autres personnages du film. L'Imperator Furiosa n'est malheureusement pas présente non plus. Vous aurez des références, mais pas grand-chose de plus.

📝 Critique : J'ai fini le jeu Mad Max. Alors, le jeu n'est pas mauvais. Il est très répétitif, certes, mais ça va. Les combats à pied ne sont pas fameux, parfois même frustrants, mais j'ai vu pire. Les combats de véhicules sont corrects, même si on a l'impression de se faire constamment ramasser, même avec l'amélioration de la protection. L'histoire est pas mal, il y a beaucoup de moments où tu as envie d'arracher la tête de certains personnages, mais encore une fois, ça va. L'histoire se déroule dans le même univers que le film, même si certains éléments manquent ou sont inexactes. Je vous le conseille, mais je vous avertis que vous ne le finirez pas en deux jours. Vous allez forcément devoir faire des pauses de plusieurs semaines, car, comme mentionné plus haut, c'est très répétitif.

👍🏻 Je le recommande ou pas : Oui, mais attention.

🕯️ Autres infos : Si vous n'êtes pas fan de véhicules ou de panoramas morts, passez votre chemin.

Mainly play it on the steam deck and let me tell you, for a game that's 9 years old it holds up shockingly well. 60 fps no problem but some places that have multiple explosions end up dropping you maybe 3-5 frames a second for just a second

I personally enjoy the gameplay loop because im borderline autistic but you kinda realize that it's mostly the same thing over and over again. The 3 factions all have the same boss type. So out of maybe 9-10 bosses only 3 of them are completely different and all of them are trivial to fight.

It's a lil like assasin's creed black flag, very mindless and combat has you easily avoid all damage simply by either killing everyone around you or just hit the dodge button that makes you into a cloud of smoke.

The climaxes that exist are usually very underwhelming, when you head for the maw it's incredibly cheesable. Sure im 9 years older and have already played the game in the past but my point still stands

besides that and the borderline horrible delay with the stick when you drive i'd say the game is a solid 8/10. gameplay is solid, sounds are amazing and the athmosphere is there for you who love a game that spends time making the game fit with the narrative

185112002.review:
[b]Genel Bakış[/b]


Mad Max, aksiyon ve açık dünya türünü bir araya getiren bir oyun. Mad Max film serisinin evrenine dayanan bu oyun, post-apokaliptik bir dünyada hayatta kalmaya çalışan Max’in hikayesini takip ediyor. Oyun, geniş bir açık dünya sunarken, zorlu çevre koşulları, savaşlar ve araba mücadeleleri etrafında şekilleniyor. Çöllerle çevrili, ezilmiş bir dünya ve sürekli olarak yok olma tehdidi altında olan kaynaklar ile sıkışmış bir karakteri oynayarak, hayatta kalmaya çalışıyorsunuz. Arabaların oldukça önemli olduğu bir oyun, her şey araçlar etrafında dönüyor. Bu açıdan oyun, benzersiz bir "araç odaklı" aksiyon deneyimi sunuyor. Ancak, her ne kadar araba savaşları keyifli olsa da, sık sık tekrar eden mekanikler zamanla deneyimi biraz düşürebiliyor.

[b]Oynanış Mekanikleri[/b]

Oynanış, açık dünya gezintisini ve araç bazlı dövüşleri bir araya getiriyor. Max’in arabasını, "Magnum Opus" adı verilen kendi aracını, oyun boyunca geliştirebiliyorsunuz. Bu araç, hayatta kalmanız için gerçekten önemli bir unsur. Çölün ortasında, saldırılara uğrarken arabanızı savunmak ve geliştirmek, savaşa girmek harika bir keyif veriyor. Max’in silahlarını ve yakın dövüş yeteneklerini de kişiselleştirebilirsiniz. Oyun, büyük ölçüde araçla ilgili aksiyon ve yakın dövüşlerden oluşuyor. Silah kullanımı ve dövüş mekanikleri sıradan olabiliyor ama araba dövüşleri kesinlikle eğlenceli. Ancak, yapısal anlamda birkaç eksiklik var: görevler sık sık tekrara düşüyor ve bazı anlar oldukça monotonlaşabiliyor. Her ne kadar araç savaşları eğlenceli olsa da, zamanla yavaşça can sıkıcı bir hale gelebiliyor.

[b]Grafikler ve Ses[/b]

Grafikler gerçekten etkileyici, özellikle atmosferin yaratılması konusunda oyun oldukça başarılı. Çölde geçen bu dünyada tozlu, terkedilmiş kasabalar, harabe kalıntılar ve araç savaşlarının keyifli görüntüleri görsel anlamda hoş bir deneyim sunuyor. Fakat, zaman zaman grafikler biraz sıkışık hale gelebilir, özellikle ışıklandırma ve bazı detaylar düzgün işlenmemiş gibi hissedilebiliyor. Ses tasarımı çok iyi, arabanın motorunun sesi, patlamaların yankıları ve çölün uğuldaması hepsi oldukça tatmin edici. Bir yanda vahşi dünyada ilerlerken, bir yanda dinamik ortam sesleri ile savaş mücadelesine girmekte zorlanmıyorsunuz. Düşman sesleri ve patlamalar ise aşırıya kaçmadan atmosfere iyi entegre olmuş.

[b]Zorluk ve Derinlik[/b]

Oyun oldukça zorlu bir deneyim sunuyor. Çevre, karanlık, terk edilmiş ve tehlikelerle dolu. Sürekli olarak araç geliştirme, görevleri yerine getirme ve çevrenin detaylarını keşfetmek gerekiyor. Ancak, tekrar eden görevler ve benzer haritalar bazen sıkıcı olabilir. Ayrıca, oyuncunun aracı sürekli olarak geliştiriyor olması, başlangıçtaki zorluk ile daha sonrakiler arasında bir denge unsuru sağlayabilir. Ancak zamanla, görevlerin monotonlaşmasıyla ilgili sorunlar ortaya çıkıyor ve zamanla daha fazla çeşitlilik aranabilir.

[b]Pozitif:[/b]

-Arabalarla yapılan savaşlar eğlenceli ve hızlı
-Gerçekten etkileyici atmosfer ve dünya tasarımı
-Savaş dinamikleri başarılı, özellikle araç ve yakın dövüş öğeleri iyi dengelenmiş
-Görsel açıdan genel olarak tatmin edici bir dünya

[b]Negatif:[/b]

-Bazı görevler sıkıcı ve monotonlaşabiliyor
-Araba dövüşleri tekrara düşebiliyor
-Bazı grafiksel eksiklikler, özellikle detay ve ışıklandırma anlamında gözlemlenebiliyor
-Temel dövüş mekanikleri bazen yetersiz kalabiliyor

[b]Genel Değerlendirme[/b]

[b]Oynanış:[/b] 7/10 (Araç savaşları oldukça keyifli, ancak görevlerin ve dünyadaki tekrarlar bazen sıkıcı olabiliyor)
[b]Grafikler:[/b] 7/10 (Etkileyici bir atmosfer olsa da, bazı detaylar ve grafiksel eksiklikler mevcut)
[b]Hikaye:[/b] 6/10 (Post-apokaliptik bir ortamda sıradan bir hayatta kalma hikayesi, çok derin değil ama eğlenceli)
[b]Genel:[/b] 7/10

[b]Sonuç[/b]

Mad Max, sürükleyici bir araç savaşları ve harabe bir dünyada hayatta kalma deneyimi sunan oldukça eğlenceli bir oyun. Çöl atmosferi ve tehlikelerle dolu harita iyi işlenmiş, fakat bazı tekrarlar ve görevlerin monotonlaşması, oyunun temposunu zamanla düşürebiliyor. Görsel açıdan tatmin edici, fakat zaman zaman teknik eksiklikler ve tekrarlayan mekanikler deneyimi zayıflatabiliyor. Eğer araç bazlı aksiyon sever bir oyuncuysanız ve post-apokaliptik atmosferi beğeniyorsanız, Mad Max kesinlikle oynanmaya değer bir seçenek.

185052972.review:
ДИСКЛЕЙМЕР: В данном обзоре присутствуют спойлеры к сюжету игры, а также немного эмоциональной "духоты". Читайте на свой страх и риск!

То самое чувство, когда прошел игру ради написания отзыва. Поначалу, играя пару часов, появилось дикое желание поскорее ее закончить. Игра вызвала больше негативных эмоций, чем положительных. Думаю, на момент выхода она могла быть крутой, но сейчас еле-еле переварил.
Далее будут разделы, связанные с этой игрой (названия придуманы на отвали).

Раздел 1 — WTF

Хороший вопрос: «Что такое безумие?» Конечно, можно ответить, как в Far Cry 3, но как на это отвечает игра?

С первой катсцены мы видим битву Макса и Члема (главный злодей). И сразу возникает вопрос: КАК, ЧЕРТ ВОЗЬМИ, ЭТО ЖИВОТНОЕ ВЫЖИЛО, КОГДА ЕМУ ГОЛОВУ РАСПИЛИЛИ БЕНЗОПИЛОЙ?! …Вот вам и безумие….

Продвигаясь по сюжету, нужно уничтожать лагеря врагов и взрывать бочки с топливом. И вот Максимильян решает подорвать бочки с помощью подожженной канистры: бросает… В этот момент камера эффектно отдаляется, показывая огромный взрывной гриб. А сам Макс, стоящий всего в десяти метрах, даже не запылился. …безумие…

Финальная битва с Члемом — это отдельное почтение. Ему в ребро вонзается огромная балка, но он, конечно же, не умирает. Только после добивного вырывания пилы. …очередное безумие…

В сюжете вообще нет адекватных людей. Одни верят в огромную волну, которая накроет землю. Другие пытаются пересечь бескрайние пустыни и т.д. Один ипYчий принцип «выживания сильнейших». 

---

Раздел 2 — Ценности

Весь путь мы проходим с Чамбакетом (механик), который видит в максимильяне бога, ангела, спасителя, спустившегося с небес. И вот в этой игре мне больше всего жалко этого персонажа. Он сделал ему из битого жигуля что то похожее на машину, все время помогал, чинил, днем и ночью… а этот ангел спустившийся с небес просто продал его с потрохами, запустил его и свою машину (которую я сyк4 собирал всю игру) в цистерну для ликвидации транспорта Члема. И наш гг даже не моргнул…безумие…

За всю игру Макс ни разу не сказал Чамбакету «спасибо». НИ РАЗУ. Его лексикон ограничивается фразами: «Кого убить?» и «Куда ехать?» . Тупое и неблагодарное животное.

Ближе к концу сюжета у Макса появляется шанс завести семью: красивая девушка с прицепом. В условиях апокалипсиса выбирать не приходиться. Но наш безумный сигма-мужчина стоит на своем и отказывается от них. В итоге их убивают. Жалости к ним не возникает, потому что игра не дала к ним привязаться. 

Это первая игра, где главный герой вызывает отвращение. Первая игра, где призраки говорят мне: «Убей его, ведь ты только это и умеешь…» Обычно в фильмах и играх они, наоборот, пытаются остановить.
---

Раздел 3 — Геймплей

Из-за того, что это порт с консоли, управление — полный отстой. Никому не нужная многозадачность на одной кнопке. А еще нужно все зажимать.

Геймплей напоминает GTA 4: «Приедь, убей, получи награду, возьми новое задание» (так и не прошел эту игру, так как скучная и душная). Все однообразно. Зачистка лагерей, поиск минных полей — сплошная духота.

Сюжет скучный, как и миссии. Единственный кайф — кататься на крутом маслкаре по пустыне. Тут есть своя атмосфера.

Отдельное спасибо разработчикам за то, что не заставляют по сюжету прокачивать машину на 100%. Чтобы улучшить ее полностью, нужно понижать уровень угрозы (зачищать лагеря, минные поля и так далее). Очередная духота. Если бы это было обязательным, я бы игру бросил.

---

Оценка: 3 из 10

185017365.review:
[h1] Mad Max - A Wasteland Adventure Worth Driving Into 8/10 [/h1]

Mad Max is an absolute blast and, in my opinion, a bit underrated. From its heart pounding vehicular combat to its deep, open world exploration, the game offers an exhilarating experience that any action fan will appreciate. The driving mechanics are top notch, making every road battle feel intense and rewarding. And when you’re not tearing up the wasteland, there’s plenty of satisfying third person combat to keep you on your toes.

The soundtrack is pure adrenaline, with a heavy mix of rock and orchestral scores that really capture the intensity of the Mad Max universe. It’s the kind of music that makes you want to put the pedal to the metal and keep driving through the apocalypse.

Fun fact: Did you know the game features a hidden tribute to the iconic [b] "Interceptor" car [/b]? Keep an eye out while exploring, and you may spot a familiar vehicle from the original films!

Overall, Mad Max delivers a highly enjoyable, immersive experience that’s often overlooked. It might not be perfect, but it’s definitely worth the ride. I’d give it an [b] 8/10 [/b]
Not just for fans of the franchise, but for anyone who loves a good action packed open-world adventure.

184987000.review:
This is a fun game and a great addition to the Mad Max franchise!
[i]Note: this does not include the terrible reboots of Fury Road and Furiosa that killed it[/i]

This game is well made, relatively few bugs that I came across, the story was good, the pacing a little slow but it's an open world game, you get that in them all, but it [b]feels[/b] like Mad Max.

There's no self hating political correctness forcing him into a backseat in his own game or making him act out of character, Max, is Max and is entirely unapologetic about it. 

He has 1 goal, survive.

Everything about this game just made it feel great, the environment / vehicles / models / characters all felt like they belong in Mad Max.

It's a little disjointed as... Australian voice actors in a lot of the roles, right hand drive cars, yet it's clearly somewhere in the continental US or at least off the coast of it, but that's nothing to dwell on just causes an eyebrow raise here an there being an Aussie.

Otherwise? 40~ hours of fun, totally worth a playthrough and it's low cost this far in means it's pretty good value for money.

Being a WB game of course they had [i]"Online services"[/i] which are now dead leaving a couple of bits of the game now inaccessible (and at least a few acheivments) but nothing major, just... time trial races against friends / your race times, and some free scrap that accrues when logged off.

easy a 7 out of 10, would Mad again.

184947570.review:
Nota: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ (5/5)
Um espetáculo pós-apocalíptico cheio de ação e emoção!

Mad Max é um dos jogos mais subestimados da última década! Ele combina uma narrativa envolvente com uma jogabilidade sólida e um mundo aberto brutalmente belo. Aqui estão os destaques:

Ambientação imersiva: O deserto pós-apocalíptico é deslumbrante, com paisagens desoladoras e tempestades de areia épicas que te deixam sem fôlego.
Combate visceral: As lutas corpo a corpo são intensas e satisfatórias, com animações impactantes e mecânicas de esquiva e contra-ataque bem polidas.
Personalização de veículos: Construir e aprimorar o Magnum Opus é viciante! Cada modificação não é apenas estética, mas afeta diretamente o desempenho nas batalhas veiculares.
Exploração recompensadora: A caça por sucata, relíquias e melhorias é envolvente. Há sempre algo novo para descobrir, seja um campo de bandidos ou uma fortaleza a conquistar.
História cativante: Max é um protagonista cheio de camadas, e sua luta por sobrevivência e redenção é emocionante.
O jogo tem um equilíbrio perfeito entre momentos de adrenalina e exploração estratégica. Se você gosta de mundos abertos, combates brutais e a franquia Mad Max, este jogo é obrigatório.

Pontos de melhoria: A repetição em algumas missões secundárias pode incomodar, mas não é nada que ofusque a experiência geral.

No geral, Mad Max entrega exatamente o que promete: caos automobilístico e ação visceral em um cenário de tirar o fôlego. Prepare-se para entrar no Wasteland e se tornar um verdadeiro Guerreiro da Estrada!

A história é um pouco rasa, Max não sabe do seu passado e tudo o que quer é um carro bem potente para cruzar o deserto de sei la o quê. No caminho ele vai conhecendo personagens que não fazem nada por conta própria, e por isso Max tem que resolver tudo para eles kkk. Senti falta de ver aqueles caras do Scrotus passando tinta spray na boca e gritando "testemunhe". Isso é uma parte do filme que me lembro bem, é algo emocionante e totalmente caótico, só acontece no vídeo inicial do jogo.

A jogabilidade se resume em trocação de soco e corridas malucas. É bem divertido no inicio, mas depois fica um pouco enjoativo, terminei a campanha e pretendo desinstalar e nunca mais jogá-lo. Mas foi bom enquanto durou essa carnificina.

O jogo tem bons gráficos e roda bem em computadores fracos. Em toda minha experiência, não deu pau hora nenhuma, ele é bem estável, pode ser minimizado sem problemas. Roda liso e sem surpresas.

[i]You've helped us some. But I still don't trust you. - Jeet[/i]
[u]Pros:[/u]
+ good capture of the desolate beauty of the Mad Max universe, with expansive deserts, dynamic weather, and detailed environments
+ car battles feel so good, with the ability to upgrade and customize vehicles
+ impressive graphics with a consistent frame rate
+ authentic audio elements, including engine roars and environmental effects
+ game is often on sale with up to 90% off
[u]Cons:[/u]
- the game adheres closely to open-world genre conventions without introducing significant new mechanics
- melee combat is just block+counterattack with few finishers
- side activities and objectives lack variety
- collectibles and resource gathering can feel like filler content
- Scrap Crew projects in camps are useless as WB servers are shut down a few years already
- there are few night missions and there is no auto pass time feature
- shotgun sometimes feels unreliable and misses a lot

Amazing game. Shame it didn't get more attention. Played it once already in the past but this time I decided to 100% it. Great hand to hand and vehicular combat. Love the car customization. Even though I only used the Magnum Opus I still loved that there is car variety. The gameplay loop is addictive. The story is pretty basic but entertaining enough. I'd say the minefields were the only dreadful activity. I know that there is some messy stuff with the development of this game, but it ties with both Fury Road and Furiosa in an ambiguous enough way that you can believe it's happening in the same universe, maybe sometimes between the two movies. All in all I very much enjoyed it.

I'm not good at giving scores but I'd say it's an 8/10 for me.

184839227.review:
It is a fun game; the story is just good enough but nothing special, but the gameplay is where this game shines. The car customisation and combat is thrilling, and the hand to hand combat is heavily inspired from the Arkham combat, but it has its own identity with the shotgun and shiv executions and skills.

The game can be challenging but is not difficult; you don't have to grind side missions or activities to keep up, only when it may require you to lower threat in some of the territories. However, the side missions, camps and etc are fun to complete but can be quite repetitive. 

However, overall the game is very fun; worth full price, but worth looking to buy on sale because it can be quite frequently for very cheap. Overall 8/10.

184804808.review:
Playing this reminds me of Red Faction Guerrilla, in a good way!  Minus the blowing up of any building you want, the gameplay loop is very much the same.  Pick up scrap, use it to upgrade, drive around and eventually just rule the wastelands.  Story is very Mad Max (both the old and new movies).  If you've come looking at this because you heard someone tell you it was good, pick it up!

Playtime represents all major and secondary missions completed.  All regions brought to 0 threat, and all car parts unlocked. Roughly 80% of small POI's completed.  After completing the main story you are still able to drive around and complete things, so there is no "new game+" functionality.  Likely could have been done quite a bit faster, and you can probably speed through just the story part in 20-25h.

Some gameplay functionality is broken because WB turned off the servers: races against other players' times are disabled, and the "scrap crew' upgrades (that are supposed to give you scrap while you are not playing) give nothing at all, so save them for the last upgrade at a stronghold.

Quite solid game, definietly has the climate of the movies. 

+ magnum opus mechanics - bored of your vehicle? Instantly swap it from a menu of workshop,
+ driving isn't perfect, but very satisfying,
+ car combat is nice, you can use multiple tactics... or just one OP thunderstick.
+/- death races - you can either enjoy or stay anoyed. 
+ a lot of stuff to upgrade, achieve, plunder and explore - some lore artifacts to find.

- combat becomes repetitive as you progres, so...
- every boss is just a copypaste of the other,
- once you get to know how to engage certain opponents etc - there is no real challenge. 
- minor bugs in-game and few crashes in the menu,
- WB turned off the serwers, so gaining all the achievemnts is almost impossible now.

Still, if you look for not that deep entertainment with some skull bashing and cool post apocalyptic car racing - it's a decent choice.

I'll start by saying that I know nothing about the Mad Max lore, except for the movie with Mel Gibson. Having said that, overall, I'd say that the game is worth playing. The driving feel nice, the story is pretty cool, especially the ending, the world feels alive and there is plenty to do. I'll try to 100% the game, but we'll see if I'll be able to, since some of the tasks I still haven't done can get pretty repetitive.

The good:
+Driving feels natural
+Car is HIGHLY customizable
+World feels alive
+Plenty to do
+Great sceneries

The bad:
-No FREAKING speedmeter (in a game where you spend most of your time in your car)
-You cannot save multiple configurations of your car (not even one "default" that you could jump back to)
-Unable to check fuel can fuel level (you find them and you can take 1 extra. Might be full, might have 1 drop, we don't know until we use it to refill the car; good luck)
-Minibosses that you fight for car collors are all EXACTLY the same, except for their color and MAYBE a different hair stile
-Unable to fast travel with Chumbucket's buggy (you HAVE to drive it if you want to take an area's treat level to 0)
-Game forces you to race using specific configurations (have fun switching from required configuration to your favorite one before and after every race)

184617633.review:
TLDR: Feels like 6/10 slop that gets repetitive quick

Gameplay is very repetitive, there is way too much side content. (one region (gutshank or whoever) has like 1 main mission in it and that's it) car combat feels drawn out and too often relied on the whim of the AI, which often acts unpredictably. Car combat feels horribly underleveled, forcing you to do repetitive tasks to meet requirements or get the necessary scrap. 
Max’s combat also feels janky or just not quite right, something about that counter timing feels slightly off and it boils down to just clicking in the right combination over and over again, its spiritual predecessor (arkham) feels superior to it in every way. Boss design also feels repetitive. There are 2 boss types (ignoring the final one - if you can call that a boss fight) it's either a big guy that swings something or a guy with daggers they both get repetitive to fight against. 
Story feels eeehhh… overly simplistic? spoilers:[spoiler]Bad guy tries to kill him, max loses car, has to build a new car, encounter woman who reminds him of dead wife, bad guy kills her, he kills bad guy, drives off into where ever the fuck.[/spoiler] It feels like the story would be more interesting if the main character wasn’t Max, he barely has any characterisation or dialog apart from: grunts “my dead wife is dead and i'm angry because my dead wife is dead.” Chumbucket unironically probably has more lines of dialog than him

P.S. main missions sometimes gate you by having requirements to complete side content which feel like padding

184617502.review:
J’ai trouvé le jeu Mad Max particulièrement réussi dans sa fidélité à l’univers des films. Les développeurs ont parfaitement capturé l’ambiance post-apocalyptique, avec des paysages désertiques à couper le souffle, des véhicules personnalisables emblématiques, et une violence brutale qui colle parfaitement à l’esprit de la saga.
L’histoire principale, bien que captivante, m’a semblé un peu courte. Cependant, cela est largement compensé par la quantité de quêtes annexes et d’activités disponibles. Entre l’exploration, la personnalisation de la voiture Magnum Opus et les affrontements avec les bandes ennemies, il y a de quoi se plonger des heures dans cet univers impitoyable.
En somme, Mad Max est une expérience immersive qui ravira les fans des films tout en offrant un gameplay varié et engageant

184611524.review:
Mad max is really fun game with some problems
In my playthrough i had a lot of fun, starting the game you are thrown into this unforgiving wasteland with your car just with the skeleton known as the magnum opus. In this journey you slowly build your car and max with upgrades, the main story mostly involves you just building your car with sprinkle of boss fights which are fairly easy and nothing special. But the gameplay here shines with the innovative car mechanics and on foot and vehicular combat. Although with some inspirations from combat of the batman arkham series, its really fresh with audio design and the combat moves. In my playthrough the main story ends pretty quickly like for some 10hrs but then you are left with car with lot of upgrades to do and outposts to take.

the graphics look extremely incredible with its unique artstyle and extremely good environment just capturing the mad max world perfectly. The sound design and music is extremely good and feels like just out of a mad max movie.

But here the problems of the game are appear, the game feels a bit repetitive once you complete upgrading the magnum opus.But sill overall MAD MAX is a must play game with a lot of fun to have in this extremely unique and impressive world

OVERALL 8/10

Seu nome é Erivaldo Jacinto Pinto, 65 anos, cansado, com um casamento fracassado e vida sexual pouco ativa, mora em Piedade, interior do estado de São Paulo e trabalha plantando cebola o dia todo. Quando chega em casa após um longo dia de trabalho, liga sua Televisão na novela mais próxima e se depara com um beijo gay. Erivaldo fica completamente enojado, desliga a TV e vai bater em sua esposa (lembre-se, ele tem 65 anos). No dia seguinte, seu amigo de longa data, Batista, lhe convida para uma viagem ate Rondonópolis, pois a família de Batista morava por la. Erivaldo, meio desconfiado mas muito fiel ao seu amigo, decide ir junto com ele, apronta suas malas, posta foto do Bolsonaro nos Status do Whats (lembre-se, ele tem 65 anos) e partem viagem.
Após uma longa viagem de quase 20hrs, vocês chegam muito cansados e param em um Hotel próximo. Após fazerem o Check-In e entrarem no quarto, seu amigo Batista se prepara para tomar banho, Erivaldo com muito tesão e sem bater aquela por quase 2 dias, decide espiar o amigo. Logo depois do ato, Batista sai do banheiro completamente nu e diz "Porque você não entrou comigo? Valzinho". Depois de uma noite longa de prazer, liberdade, sacanagem e promiscuidade, Erivaldo volta para sua triste vida em Piedade, mas como uma grande lembrança de uma noite feliz.

Esse jogo passa esse sentimento, antes dele, tudo é chato, ao comprar-lo, é duvida, ao jogar-lo, é prazer e ao terminar-lo, a vida volta ser a mesma, mas você tem a lembrança vivida da felicidade.

184571199.review:
I think this game is underrated, especially if we consider when it came out (2015), and was overshadowed by other AAA titles during that time. I had lots of fun playing this even ten years after its release (2025), I was pleasantly surprised (sure you can see how it lacks polishing, and is rough in some edges).
If you liked the movie Mad Max: Fury Road you will like this game.
I would LOVE to see this type of game with 2025 potential. Mad Max 2 please.
I'm so happy that I discovered this while on discount and experienced this game. Shame lots of people may have missed out.

PROS:
+ Surprisingly good graphics. especially for 2015 (like the explosions are so satisfying like a Michael Bay movie)
+ Fighting is amazing. You can really feel the power, anger. It's so good.
+ The whole wasteland vibe, post-apocalyptic dystopia is palpable. And this is the sum of many parts done well (not going to go in details).
+ The environment design, character and car customization are so true to the Mad Max world..
+ The last mission is emotional and action packed, like a movie ending. I felt it, was nice!

CONS
- Lack of things to do besides main quests. I myself like to max out a game with all the small errands to do, collect everything, clear all camps etc... so I was but with that for 50+ hours but I understand its most fun for majority of gamers and would rather have more meaningful content so I'll put this as a negative.
- Very few interactions with the world, from what we would expect from similar games nowadays. There is so much more potential left burrowed under ground.
- Better character building/ development
- Game is too easy

8/10 
Play it, Buy it especially on sale.

184531309.review:
[b]Wasted potential[/b]

[b]Short review[/b]
Could have been an epic game, but fell short in nearly every way. Think of Arkham City/Knight w/o love or a dish w/o gravy. Typical modern "AAA game" with decent graphics lacking everything else. Bought it for $/Eur 2,- and it ain't worth anymore. Suggestion: Play Arkham City, or Arkham Knight or GTA instead, if you want an intriguing story, great combat and cool cars to drive. In a few years time AI could develop such type of games easily.

[b]In detail[/b]
Positive:
[list]
[*]Atmospheric, nice effects with the sound of the wind.
[*]Characters look really cool.
[*]After all these years, only minor bugs, but apparently from the get-go not bad in that respect.
[*]Plays on Linux. Huge plus, but even that can't stop me from downvoting it.
[*]Hope in chains.
[/list]
Negative:
[list]
[*]Arkham City combat, but much clunkier. Enemies attack during kill animation, 10 different moves leading to the same result and having the same button combination.
[*]Story or lack therof (about as much as Tetris or Pacman would have).
[*]You have seen one boss/race/camp, you have seen them all:
[*]All of Lord Testicle's Top Dog's are carbon copies and have exactly the same, easy to counter attack pattern. There is only one other attack pattern on two occasions.
[*]There are three different types of races, which are all the same all over the map.
[*]Game concept and progression is bullsquid: If you clear one area out, you already progressed to the end.
[*]"Archangels" are useless, give no extra bonuses and are usually much worse than your own car build.
[*]In any setup, the car drives like a tank; GTA 5 also had booster cars, but they are fun to drive unlike the "Magnus Opus".
[*]90% boring fetch quests, the rest is driving from A to B in a badly protected, slow vehicle - utter fun.
[*]Yes, there is fast travel (thankfully), but the game has an abundance of time wasting events, like sending you multiple times across the whole map or encounters which are totally forgettable or having to use a different vehicle for clearing mines, etc.
[*]Max yelling at his annoying partner or being tough to side characters for no reason. The sage Griffa blathering.
[*]Quality of life updates are missing: Horrible jumping mechanics and having to press a button to scale a ladder.
[*]Every way of food consumption, refilling water or refueling the car have the same cut scenes over and over again.
[/list]

184521339.review:
Ты безумный чувак в кожаной куртке, со своей машиной смерти, раскатываешь по пустыне смерти где не ничего кроме остатков былой жизни и безумных жителей этой пустыни. Что может быть круче чем это?
Игра по визуалу неплохая, особенно на 2015 год. Игровые механики мне понравились, машина не только управляется хорошо и приятно так ее можно настроить как только тебе угодно. Хочешь разрушителя который будет мчатся на всех парах и сносить кого угодно своей мощной броней? Без проблем, а хочешь маневренного, вооруженного железного жеребца? Пожалуйста! Боевка в этой игре приятная, но есть такое чувство что Макс превосходит всех противников по умениям и урону(ну в принципе так оно и есть, он все таки имеет военное прошлое как я понял) из-за этого дальше чем ты прокачиваешся ты начинаешь не чувствовать своих оппонентов, особенно с имба дробовиком который ваншотает любого рядового врага, но в целом все очень приятное и красивое. 
Локации в игре сделаны хорошо, то ли это обычные места поживы или же лагеря главарей и другие места интереса.
В каждой локации есть чем поживится, то ли это лом, то ли вода и еда или реликвия из прошлого.
Враги сделаны неплохо но могло быть лучше. Главари это просто однотипные мини-боссы в них ничего особенного и убиваются они очень легко, особенно если использовать заточки имба-дробаш. Проблему может только составлять большое кол-во врагов и горлан который их бустит, но парирование такая имба что мама не горюй, с этим парированием можно любую толпу умотать главное просто вовремя все нажимать и парировать каждый удар оборванцев.
Сюжет здесь почти никакой для меня, Макс просто безумный чувак который хочет покою, ну понимаю его покою хочется но не надо же быть мразью ко всем кто тебе хочет помочь, к своему механику жестянщику относиться как к вещи хоть он ему и помог найти новый движок и вообще машину ему свою отдал красавчик вообще. Ну а главный злодей это огромный чувак который брат главного злодея из нового фильма и его зовут Члем. Ну почти Член. Тоже конченый мужик.
С валютой для прокачки машины тут будут по началу проблемы, но если захватывать все лагеря и собирать проекты в крепостях то лом будет сам тебе приходить и потихоньку будешь накапливать на новые апгрейды.
А так игра отпад, на одно или два прохождения а главное она веселая.
8 Безумных Максимов из 10
